short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly access Google Maps without having to leave your tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instant Maps is designed to be used when a user is on a webpage and wishes to quickly locate something on a map.  This extension allows maps to be seamlessly incorporated into the task at hand while the user can focus on the big picture.
